title: Ruth Week 1 with Kristi McLelland
description:
Join us this week on the She Reads Truth podcast as Raechel and Amanda are joined by Bible teacher, professor, author, and biblical culturist, Kristi McLelland. From perpetual loss to abundant provision, the book of Ruth is full of surprises worth delighting in at every turn. Listen in as Raechel, Amanda, and Kristi encourage us to respond to the heart of God through the everyday details of our lives.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Ruth reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Ruth collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/ruth-week-1-with-kristi-mclelland
